file_content.text: Ah, my minions. You have answered Elshuu's summons.
I only require one of you to be my vessel and means of escape from this void. The rest of you will protect me.
But you will all be remembered and share in my every triumph. Your last awareness will be an incredible sense of pride.
Ah, you must be the strongest of my minions. You have answered Elshuu's summons.
The honor of being my vessel and the means of my escape from this void is yours.
Every being I destroy will be in part because of you. Your last awareness will be a great sense of pride. Few beings receive such an end.
I'm not here to help you.
I see. Then you are not of me.
Insults? You are not of me!
Your voice does not match mine. You are not of my influence.
Welcome to my parlor. Fool. I will crush you, then use you to find freedom. You will be the first of my new era of victims!
Welcome to my parlor. Fools. I will crush you all, then use you to find freedom. You will be the first of my new era of victims!
